title: incorrect link in "The Go Specification"
body:
by **jason.songhurst**: 
Towards the end of the section titled "Struct Types", the following sentence
appears:

   The tags are made visible through a reflection interface but are otherwise ignored.

The words 'reflection interface' are the text of a hyperlink that points to
http://golang.org/ref/spec#Package_unsafe, which has nothing to do with the reflection
interface (as far as I can tell).
